Sections.Heading: About Course
Sections.Content: A structured program that teaches Arabic reading and speaking from the basics to confident communication. Focuses on letter recognition, pronunciation, vocabulary, sentence formation, and conversational skills.

Sections.Heading: Who is it for?
Content: Students who can read a little but want fluency
Learners who struggle with pronunciation or sentence formation
Anyone seeking structured guidance to speak Arabic confidently

Smooth reading and understanding of texts
Ability to form and speak simple sentences
